name: IELTS Complete Package
description: Complete guide for IELTS. This course is planned for Speaking, Listenning, Reding and Writing all four modules. The IELTS cambridge books and other notes will be provided. Total 80 classes will be held for each batch.

name: JLPT Japanese Language - N5
description: This course is fpr the beginners of Japanese language. The primary question answers, ettiquate talkings and the basic Kanji and hiragan will be taught. Ever class will contain a test. Total 20 classes will be held

name: JLPT Japanese Language - N4
description: After finishing and passing the N exam, a person can got admitted to N4. The updated pronunciation, basic grammers, and self describing mudules will be included in this traininng. Total 30 classes will be held, each class wll contain a test.

name: French for Beginners
description: This course is a basic to advance French language guideline. Instructor will describe every situations and then students will perform based on the language they are taught. total 80 classes will held. weekly examination will be counted stricktly.

name: English for Kids
description: Kids English is designed according to the childrens soft minded learning skills. Two lady instructors will train students in speaking, character recognizing and basic engkish ettiquates. Total 60 classes will be held, and no exam for kids.

name: Proffessional Spoken English
description: The corporate level English will be taght in this course. Three instructors will guide the gesture, speaking, and other corporate ettiquates. Total 25 classes will be held. No exams at all, but few large projects will be given.

name: Basic German
description: The educational, or working German language will be taught in this whole module. A German instructor will guide once a week. Total 80 classes will be held. 6 assignments will be given.

name: Proffessional German
description: The corporate level German will be taght in this course. Three instructors will guide the gesture, speaking, and other corporate ettiquates. Total 25 classes will be held. No exams at all, but few large projects will be given.
